ca.gedge.opgraph.app.components
Class DoubleClickableTextField

java.lang.Object
  ca.gedge.opgraph.app.components.DoubleClickableTextField

public class DoubleClickableTextField
extends Object

A text field that begins editing on double-click. When the ENTER key is pressed, editing finishes and the text is updated. When the ESCAPE key is pressed, editing finishes and the text reverts to its state before editing began.
